mobs.long_desc: A troll sorcerer glares in your direction.
mobs.desc: Before you is Mesmeriz, the troll sorcerer who is lord of the Minithawkin Mines.  Much taller than a human, though on the short side for a troll, his green skin is painted with purple and red symbols to enhance his arcane magic. One of his horns curls back, like a ram's, but the other has been broken off a few inches away from his head.  His expression is very intelligent, and therefore very dangerous.

mobs.long_desc: A phantom guardian halts your progress.
mobs.desc: A constantly shifting creature, the phantom guardian phases back and forth from the astral plane at will.  Looking at it too long would probably induce some kind of nausea, since it is completely inhuman.  If it detects anything that does not belong in the mines (such as yourself), it phases completely into this plane and shifts itself into the form of a wall.

mobs.long_desc: A phantom guardian flickers to and from the astral plane.
mobs.desc: This phantom makes sniffing sounds as if trying to detect intruders, floating around and constantly shifting its shape by phasing in and out of the astral plane.  It totally ignores the creatures that are supposed to be in the mines, but snarls in an inhuman voice if it encounters anything else.

mobs.long_desc: A slender well-built woman cautiously eyes you.
mobs.desc: As you gaze upon this woman, her deteriorated face makes you shiver. Through the wrinkles on her face, and her well-built body, she gives you a sense of tranquility. She patiently continues working hard and only briefly looks up to acknowledge your presence.

mobs.long_desc: Cirion stands here creating magical flowers.
mobs.desc: As you look upon this humble man, he smiles in your direction.  He's wearing what looks like it used to be a white robe, but it has been soiled by dirt. His face looks old, and exhausted.  You notice a few strands of white hair sticking out from his hood.

mobs.long_desc: A huge human warrior growls angrily at you.
mobs.desc: He is a very well built human, though somewhat past his prime judging from his graying hair and wrinkled face.  He looks somehow familiar, but his eyes seem blank.  His clothing was probably very fine once, but it is now frayed and torn in many places.  Muscles hard as rock ripple when he moves, so messing with him would probably be unwise.

mobs.long_desc: A skeleton walks about minding its own business.
mobs.desc: As you look upon the skeleton, the skeleton turns to you and tilts his head, and then proceeds to scratch his head in muse. The skeleton sits down, and takes a bone from his leg and begins to write on the dirt floor. \  \  / \ \    \--\  --- \--\ \--\ \--\ \    \   \  \  \ / \  \ \  \ \--- \--\  --- \  \ Then he points to himself, and continues to write out, 'free us please!'

mobs.long_desc: A dwarven miner is chipping away at the side of the mine.
mobs.desc: A short, stocky humanoid is standing in front of you.  His eyes are cloudy and he appears to be in a zombie-like trance, for he hasn't noticed you.  This miner looks rather old and exhausted, but continues to work with precision, and wholeheartedness.

mobs.long_desc: A troll miner is wandering about looking for more work.
mobs.desc: A large green humaniod towers above you.  His eyes are cloudy and he appears to be in a zombie like trance, for he hasn't noticed you.  As you get closer the smell of unwashed troll threatens to overwhelm your fragile senses with its reek.

mobs.long_desc: A messenger is aimlessly running around in circles here.
mobs.desc: A man dressed in shabby worn-out clothes is running around in circles.  His face shows confusion, frustration and depression.  His feet are filthy.  It appears as if he's been wandering this mine for years.  Though his quest seems fruitless, he does not give up and is constantly moving.

mobs.long_desc: A phantom guardian halts your progress.
mobs.desc: A constantly shifting creature, the phantom guardian phases back and forth from the astral plane at will.  Looking at it too long would probably induce some kind of nausea, since it is completely inhuman.  If it detects anything that does not belong in the mines (such as yourself), it phases completely into this plane and shifts itself into the form of a wall.

mobs.keywords: shape phantasmic phantom wisp shadow phantasmic-phantom
mobs.long_desc: Without form or mass, the wisp of a shadow flitters through the stale air.
mobs.desc: Obviously a being from a world beyond this one, the shadow seems to have no substance or form to it, merely hovering ethereally in the air.  Perhaps it would be better described as a nonbeing.

objects.ground: A key made of some type of mineral has been deposited here.

extras.text: This key was carved out of some odd clear rock. The key is in the shape of an L, with a sun carved out of the top part of the key.

objects.ground: A purple key lies amongst the dust on the floor.

extras.text: It looks like a purple painted skeleton key. The purple color rubs off onto your hands.

objects.ground: A map has been carelessly dropped here.

extras.text: The map shows the surrounding mountainous area. This mine is marked by an X. There's a small inscription towards the bottom.
From the beginning - Never ever needed such sweet words, endearing... The remaining words are too faded to read.

objects.ground: A heap of thick heavy cloth had been discarded here.

extras.text: This robe has been made from small links of thawkinixa, and is slightly heavier then your average robe.  On the back of the robe, a small picture has been painted.  The picture depicts a troll sorcerer holding his arms up to the heavens as lightning surrounds him in a barrage of bolts.

objects.ground: A rock pulsating with colors hypnotizes you.

extras.text: You are holding a piece of a legendary mineral known as "thawkinixa".  For many years this mineral was thought to be mythical, but now you hold the only known piece.  As you watch the colors pulsate thoughout the rock, your soul fills with greed.  Think of what it must be worth!

objects.ground: A pair of stone textured gloves have been left here unattended.

extras.text: The gloves appear to be white in color.  Their surface feels as hard as a rock, yet they flex.  For looking and feeling like a rock, they sure are light. They must be magical...  What is this strange material?  There appear to be some initials carved into the inside of the gloves.
The initials read E.A. 80

objects.ground: A pair of boots made out of some strange mineral lie here.

extras.text: The boots look like rock, and feel like a rock, but are fairly light to be rock. The boots are clear in color. You imagine that they might be nice to wear in case a heavy object should fall on your feet. There appear to be some initials carved into the bottom of these boots.
The initials read E.A. 21

objects.ground: A stone textured hard-helmet has been left here just waiting to be worn.

extras.text: Looking at the hard-helmet, you notice many scratches, as if it's had its fair share of use.  You also notice that the helmet is clear in color.  It feels like a very sturdy piece of mining equipment.  There appear to be some initials carved inside the helmet.
The initials read E.A. 77

objects.ground: A pickaxe made of some odd stone is stuck in the side of the wall.

extras.text: The shaft of this pickaxe is made of some odd material, and so is the blade of the pickaxe.  Obviously someone has spent a lot of hard work creating this rather odd tool.  There appear to be some initials scratched on the bottom of the pickaxe.
The initials read E.A.

objects.ground: A torch made of an odd material is glowing softly.

extras.text: The torch is oddly not made out of wood, iron, or any other metal known to man. It's made of rock that appears crystal clear.  It gives off a soft glow, and sends a small charge though your body.  There appear to be some initials carved into the base of the torch.
The initials read E.A.

objects.ground: A hand whittled flute has lost its owner.
objects.action_desc: A melodious tune drifts from the flute.

extras.text: The flute appears to have been whittled by a professional whittler.  It's the perfect replica of a flute, and even sounds good when you make a terrible attempt at playing it.  There's a name carved toward the bottom of the flute.
Cirion the eternally enslaved.

objects.ground: A delicious looking flower lies here, waiting to be eaten.

extras.text: The flower resembles a perfect looking daisy, and is yellow in color. The flower smells good enough to eat, and just looking at it makes you kind of hungry. The more you study the flower, the more it looks like some type of magical food, rather than a real flower.

objects.ground: A small underground brook seems to have found its way here.

extras.text: A small brook has cut a path though the rock. It looks clean enough to drink. The clear, quickly flowing water feels cold to the touch.

objects.ground: A necklace carved from wood has been dropped here.

extras.text: The necklace's main pendant is carved in the shape of a tree.  The tree appears to be growing...  Can this be?  You notice at the bottom of the necklace that you can see the trees' rings...  You count 50.  On the side of the tree there appears to be an inscription.
Cirion the eternally enslaved.

objects.ground: A large black dagger lies here.

extras.text: Large and made of a blackened metal, this dagger looks like it was made for the hands of something larger than human.  Its leather grip is bloodstained but comfortable, and it looks like it has been replaced more than once.  Its pommel is a crystal of the colorful, rare mineral thawkinixa.

objects.ground: A rolled-up piece of paper is nearly hidden among the mess here.

extras.text: The letter is written on a thick paper in dark red ink.  It reads: To Mesmeriz of the Minithawkin Mines Dated The 11th Day of the Month of Heroes and Valor, Year 468. From Arseynh Z'Kenian Z'Kenian House Dheduu Regarding the status of your request.  House Z'Kenian is more than willing to trade soulsteel in exchange for thawkinixa, however be aware that this is done without sanction of the city's ruling body, House Kar'Shezden.  As such, we are unable to comply with the second part of your request and we are unable to free the city's troll slaves in exchange for dwarven ones softened by mind control tactics.  The secret of forging adamantium must likewise remain with the drow until further negotiations can be made. Should you find these conditions acceptable, please respond with all haste. We await your reply.

objects.ground: Some notes are pinned to the wall here.

extras.text: The notes read: "Need phylactery to complete spell. In pos. of blue drgn? Not planar. Giant worm? Wd. eat.  Poor lich. Look elsewhere in drgn. lair. Probably gemstn. May have to send slv to find. Recognize by drain. If no drain wrong lich."

objects.ground: A small, sleek, cylindrical object has been misplaced here.

extras.text: It appears to be metallic in composition. There is a small button located on one of the sides of the cylinder. Upon closer examination you notice an engraving, which reads... Property of Ben Kenobi, Jedi-Master.

objects.ground: A brown linen cloak lies here, left behind by its owner.

extras.text: The cloak is brown in color and is well used. It has a rough texture and is made of a fairly heavy material. It appears to be a jedi's cloak. It gives off a peaceful, relaxing feeling. A small tag on the inside reads of the cloak reads... Property of Ben Kenobi, Jedi-Master.

objects.ground: A twisted piece of wood is resting here.

extras.text: It is a branch of wood about as thick as a troll's forearm and a good foot and a half long.  It looks like it was snapped off a large tree rather than cut cleanly.  The wood itself is a medium-brown with a slight reddish tinge and seems light yet tough.  Mangrove is a tropical wood, so what in the world was this branch doing way up in the middle of Mount Frostbite?

objects.ground: A crystal vial containing a dark red liquid has been abandoned here.

extras.text: The vial is about as large as a troll's pinky and made of fine crystal, stoppered with wax and lead.  The liquid inside is a dark red, somewhere between old blood and pomegranate juice.  The quality of craftmanship seems very high, much higer than you would expect from such a primitive people.

objects.ground: A rough chunk of striped green stone is sitting here.

extras.text: This chunk of rock is about the size of a troll's fist and made of a deep green, striped mineral called malachite.  It's made of horizontal bands of many different shades ranging from dark moss to the pale green of new leaves.  It is considered a soft stone, so it is possible that it was once polished but became chipped.  However, this green stone is often found deep inside mountains. What is it doing in the swamps?

objects.ground: A scowling mask of a troll lies forgotten on the ground.

extras.text: Made of a hard mangrove wood dyed a deep blood-red by some unknown technique, this mask shows a scowling troll, complete with horns and fangs and terrifying to an opponent.  It is set with studs of malachite to catch the light and add a bit of surrealism to the mask.  Both protective and useful, it glows with magical energy.  This mask was surely crafted by a master.

triggers.name: phantom-guardian-block-north
triggers.commands: msend %actor% The phantom turns into a wall and blocks your way! mechoaround %actor% Suddenly, the phantom guardian takes the shape of a wall, blocking passage.

triggers.name: mezmeriz_death_speech
triggers.commands: say You'll never get my treasure!

triggers.name: Phantom_guard_greet
triggers.commands: * This is a prog to greet players if %actor.vnum% == -1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'This is no place for puny mortals, like yourself!' msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Go home at once!' else end

triggers.name: Engaja_speech1
triggers.commands: mechoaround %actor% %self.name% speaks to %actor.name% in a low voice. msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'He knew you were on your way, so he tried to make your' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'journey as easy as possible, but I guess you aren't as' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'good as he thought. He always overestimates his opponents.'

triggers.name: Engaja_all_greet1
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'What took you so long?' msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Mesmeriz expected you at least a week ago...' else end

triggers.name: Cirion_speech1
triggers.commands: mechoaround %actor% %self.name% speaks to %actor.name% in a low voice. msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Our bodies are getting old, and are starting to decay, but' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'our minds and souls are still strong. Now he can kill us,' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'and set our spirits free. Freedom here I come!' thank %actor.name%

triggers.name: Cirion_speech2
triggers.commands: mechoaround %actor% %self.name% speaks to %actor.name% in a low voice. msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Don't think you came here on your own free will.' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'If you do then you are only deceiving yourself even more.' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Mesmeriz brought you here.'

triggers.name: Cirion_all_greet1
triggers.commands: * All greet trig for players if %actor.vnum% == -1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah, finally Mesmeriz has summoned someone else here to be his slaves.' else end

triggers.name: Minithawk_messenger_speech1
triggers.commands: mechoaround %actor% %self.name% speaks to %actor.name% in a low voice. msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Yes, killed...as in dead.  Mesmeriz would have my head if he' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'knew I were talking to you.  His direct orders were for me to' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'go to Templace, and deliver this rock.'

triggers.name: Messenger_test_chatter
triggers.commands: * This was probably to be intended as a serial * monologue that the messenger spoke at a timed * interval.  Maybe this could be a random type * of trig that said each of these lines or pieces * of related topic at random times. wait 1 s say Which way to town!? wait 5 s say I must get this to town! wait 5 s say No, wait a second... wait 30 say What am I thinking? I hold the only piece of Thawkinixa! wait 30 say I am rich!!! I'm going to keep it. wait 5 s say Wait a minute, if I don't return this to town I will be killed! wait 5 s say Oh, what to do wait 20 say what to do...

triggers.name: Minithawk_messenger_speech2
triggers.commands: mechoabout %actor% %self.name% speaks to %actor.name% in a low voice. msend %actor% %self.name% says to you 'Thank you very much!  Now if I could just find a way out of this mine!'

triggers.name: Minithawk_messenger_speech3
triggers.commands: mechoaround %actor% %self.name% speaks to %actor.name% in a low voice. msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Yes, I must go to Templace. Which way?'

triggers.name: minithawk_entrance_closedoff
triggers.commands: if %direction% == south wecho Rays of light creep in as the lumber around the mine's entrance is pulled back. wait 1 wecho The lumber around the mine's entrance suddenly grows unstable, creaking loudly. wecho In a great cloud of dust the mine entrance collapses, leaving no way back out. endif

triggers.name: baldathor_greet
triggers.commands: msend %actor% The warrior's eyes begin to glow &1&bred&0 as he looks straight at you! wait 1 snarl %actor%

triggers.name: mes-greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.race% /= troll if %actor.quest_stage[troll_quest]% != 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Welcome!  It has been many years indeed since I have had the pleasure of conversing with another troll from the lands above.' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Unfortunately my research has kept me belowground and  far from the swamps of our home.' sigh wait 3s consider %actor.name% if %actor.level% >= 55 msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'It looks like we are still the strongest of the clans, my friend.  Perhaps we can help each other.' quest start troll_quest %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Long ago, some powerful items of the trolls were stolen by jealous Shamen from different tribes and hidden away.' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'If you were to bring the objects back to me, I could reward you quite handsomely.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'One is the the bough of a sacred mangrove tree that stood in the courtyard of a great troll palace before it was destroyed by a feline god of the snows.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'One is a vial of red dye made from the blood of our enemies, stolen by a tribe in a canyon who wished to unlock its power.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'One is a large hunk of malachite, a stone we have always valued for its deep green color.  Our enemies the swamp lizards also liked its color, however, and guard it jealously.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'I am sure you can restore our lost honor.  Return them to me and the power of the Trolls shall be known once again!' set troll_quest 1 global troll_quest else wink %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Come back to me when you have grown a bit and I shall see what we can do for each other, young one.' endif elseif %actor.quest_stage[troll_quest]% == 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'Welcome back!  If you have the items, give them to me.' endif else frown msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'And what exactly are YOU doing here?!' wait 1s sigh msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'No, do not answer.  It seems I shall have to deal with you myself after all.' msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, 'You must be quite resourceful to have found me, but I cannot be bothered just now.  Leave me.' wait 2s mecho %self.name% turns away from you. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Or attack me, if you are feeling particularly stupid.' endif

triggers.name: phantom-guardian-block-east
triggers.commands: msend %actor% The phantom turns into a wall and blocks your way! mechoaround %actor% Suddenly, the phantom guardian takes the shape of a wall, blocking passage.

triggers.name: phantom-guardian-block-west
triggers.commands: msend %actor% The phantom turns into a wall and blocks your way! mechoaround %actor% Suddenly, the phantom guardian takes the shape of a wall, blocking passage.

triggers.name: phantom-guardian-block-south
triggers.commands: msend %actor% The phantom turns into a wall and blocks your way! mechoaround %actor% Suddenly, the phantom guardian takes the shape of a wall, blocking passage.

triggers.name: mes-rec
triggers.commands: *first lets check the PC is the right race! if %actor.race% /= troll *now lets check to make sure the item is correct and we didn't already have it, if both are good then lets mark it gotten. if (%object.vnum% == 37080) set gooditem 1 if (%actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37080] != 1) set gotitem 1 quest variable troll_quest %actor.name% got_item:37080 1 endif elseif (%object.vnum% == 37081) set gooditem 1 if (%actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37081] != 1) set gotitem 1 quest variable troll_quest %actor.name% got_item:37081 1 endif elseif (%object.vnum% == 37082) set gooditem 1 if (%actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37082] != 1) set gotitem 1 quest variable troll_quest %actor.name% got_item:37082 1 endif else set gooditem 0 endif *alright, do we have everything now? if (%actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37080]% == 1 && %actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37081]% == 1 && %actor.quest_variable[troll_quest:got_item:37082]% == 1 && !%actor.has_completed[troll_quest]%) *if everything is handed in we're done! mecho %self.name% smiles broadly as he looks at the gathered ingredients. say Yes, these will do quite nicely indeed.  Excellent work. wait 2s mecho %self.name% opens the seal on the vial of dye and a sweet scent fills the  room. mecho Taking the vial on one hand, he slowly pours it over the mangrove branch, creating a slight hissing noise and a black, oily-smelling smoke. wait 1s mecho %self.name% places the hunk of malachite amidst the smoking concoction and waves his hands over it, muttering a strange mantra. mecho A red light erupts from the center of the branch, nearly blinding you! wait 2s mecho When the smoke clears and the light is gone, %self.name% smiles proudly. quest complete troll_quest %actor.name% say Here you go, little one.  May your ambitions guide you and lead you to prosperity and rulership. mload obj 37083 give troll-mask %actor.name% bow %actor% wait 1 say I am certain we shall meet again. *okay maybe we've already done this quest elseif (%actor.has_completed[troll_quest]%) wait 3s say You have already helped me once, please let others help me now. give %object.name% %actor.name% *what if we don't have everything but did have a good item? elseif (%gotitem% == 1) wait 3s say Why thank you.  Run along now. mjunk %object.name% *so what if it's a good item but we already have it? elseif (%gooditem% == 1) wait 3s say I'm sorry but you already gave me this item. give %object.name% %actor.name% *uh oh, bad item, didn't need this one else wait 3s say What is this? I can not use this. give %object.name% %actor.name% endif *ending from the race check. else if %object.vnum% == 12526 wait 3s mjunk gem blink say How did you know I needed this?! wait 2s mecho %self.name% quickly pockets the ruby. say Here, my thanks. set lap 1 while %lap% < 11 mexp %actor% 10000 eval lap %lap% + 1 done set random_gem %random.11% eval which_gem %random_gem% + 55736 mload obj %which_gem% set random_gem %random.11% eval which_gem %random_gem% + 55736 mload obj %which_gem% set random_gem %random.11% eval which_gem %random_gem% + 55736 mload obj %which_gem% give all.gem %actor.name% say Here is a small token of my appreciation. say Now move along. else wait 1s say What is this? I can not use this. return 0 end end

triggers.name: thawkinixa_madness_curse
triggers.commands: set worn %self.worn_by% set carried %self.carried_by% if !%worn% && !%carried% halt elseif %worn.vnum% == -1 osend %worn% Desire for thawkinixa overwhelms your thoughts! ocast confusion %worn% elseif %carried.vnum% == -1 osend %carried% Desire for thawkinixa overwhelms your thoughts! ocast confusion %carried% endif

triggers.name: troll-quest_shaman-load-mangrove
triggers.commands: if %actor.race% /= troll mjunk mangrove-branch mload obj 37080 say You're a troll else say You're not a troll! end

triggers.name: troll-quest_shaman-load-dye
triggers.commands: if %actor.race% /= troll mjunk red-dye mload obj 37081 end

triggers.name: troll-quest_malachite-load
triggers.commands: if %actor.race% /= troll || %actor.quest_stage[acid_wand]% == 7 mjunk malachite mload obj 37082 endif

triggers.name: room_37060_randoms
triggers.commands: wecho The flashing lights dance rhythmically across your vision, slowly hypnotizing you into a trance. wait 4s wecho A loud bang explodes in the center of the circle, snapping you out of your trance! wecho The glowing circle drawn on the floor intensifies, nearly blinding you with its brightness. wait 3s wload mob 37060 wecho As you look on, a small black portal opens in the center of the circle. wecho Suddenly, a black phantasmic shape flies up out of the portal. wecho The portal subsides to nothingness behind the phantom. wait 3s wecho The phantasmic shape melts through the ceiling above you. wpurge phantasmic-phantom

triggers.name: troll-mask
triggers.commands: if %actor.race% /= troll return 1 oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% looks suddenly more fierce. osend %actor% You feel the strength of the Trolls in your blood! else return 0 osend %actor% You cannot wear the trollish mask. endif

rooms.name: Entrance to the Minithawkin Mines
rooms.description: You are standing at the mouth of a mine.  The darkness from within the mine seems ready to swallow you, just as it has done to many other well known adventurers, or so legend has it.  The entrance has been boarded up with lumber and a "Do Not Enter" sign attached.  An additional sign has been placed in front of the entrance.  You could retreat back to the dense wood by going east, or if you were feeling particularly foolish you could attempt to enter the mine to the north.

North.description: It looks like you might be able to move some of the lumber, and crawl in.

East.description: It looks like an entrance to a forest.

extras.text: NO TRESPASSING! Entering this mine is considered a foolish act, and therefore all who enter are entering at their own risk! All who enter will be prosecuted if they are ever found alive... Signed this 23rd day of the Month of the Firestorm Year 458 By the Dwarves of Anduin
It looks like you might be able to move some of it to create an opening.

rooms.name: Inside the Minithawkin Mines
rooms.description: Darkness falls around you.  The exit that should lie to the south disappears into darkness.  The only sounds that can be heard are the echoes of footsteps from far away.  This mine is supposed to be abandoned, so hopefully the footsteps aren't proof otherwise...

North.description: There is no exit that way! You've just been trapped inside!

East.description: To the east the tunnel looks like it splits up.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Mines
rooms.description: The mine splits off here.  One tunnel heads to the north, and the other tunnel heads east-west.  The echoing footsteps are growing louder, but it could just be a trick of sound due to the open tunnels in three directions.  The dirt on the tunnel floor shows footprints crossing and recrossing, but in a cave it is impossible to tell their age.

North.description: The tunnel continues to the north.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

West.description: It looks like a dead end.

rooms.name: Bend in the Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel is very dark.  You can hear the faint sound of water dripping, but you can't tell which direction it's coming from, due to the echoes in here. A chill breeze suggests a vent, though no light comes down from above.  The tunnel continues to the north and west.

North.description: The tunnel continues to the north.

West.description: The tunnel continues to the west.

rooms.name: Rescue Down Tunnel
rooms.description: A crudely dug hole lies in the center of the floor.  It appears to be big enough for even a large troll to fit through.  A rope has been attached to the ceiling and hangs down into the hole.  The rather crude handiwork here compared to the rest of the mine looks like the result of hasty work.  You could climb the rope down or retreat back east.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

Up.description: There's a rope attached to the ceiling.

extras.text: The rope looks like it could help you climb down the hole.
The hole looks like it was dug in a hurry.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing in the Mines
rooms.description: The tunnel comes to another T-crossing.  The tunnel to the west looks more recently dug than the tunnel that continues north and south.  It would seem, judging by the scrapes and gouges on the floor of the tunnel, that attempts have been made to dig down, but they were thwarted by a large rock.

North.description: The tunnel continues to the north.

South.description: The tunnel continues to the south.

West.description: A newer tunnel has been dug there.

Down.description: The rock is scarred with shovel marks.

extras.text: It covers the entire floor in one solid piece. It appears as if several attempts were made to move the rock.

rooms.name: Bend in the Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel is very dark.  As you are scanning your surroundings, something icy cold and wet drips on your head.  Scraps of metal and leather litter the floor, giving the impression that this place was abandoned in a hurry.  The tunnel continues to the east and to the south.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

South.description: The tunnel continues to the south.

Up.description: As you look up another drip falls on your head.

rooms.name: Bend in the Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel is very dark.  You can hear the faint sound of water dripping, but you can't tell which direction it's coming from, due to the echoes in here. A small glow can be seen to the north.  The tunnel continues to the north and west.

North.description: The tunnel continues to the north.

West.description: The tunnel continues to the west.

rooms.name: A Blood-Covered Shaft
rooms.description: The smell of blood looms in the air.  Debris is scattered about on the floor.  Looking closer at the walls you notice that they appeared to be bloodstained as if a gory battle had taken place here.  A few bones remain scattered about the floor.

East.description: It looks there was a cave-in that way!

South.description: The tunnel continues to the south.

extras.text: Some of the bones look to be rather large for a human, and the other bones look to be too small to be human.

rooms.name: A Cave-In
rooms.description: Large rocks and boulders cover the ground.  Judging from the looks of the ceiling, and the ground, you would have to guess that some type of cave-in occured here.  Underneath this mess of rubble must lie the original entrance to the second level of the mine.  Every now and then you spot a bone sticking out from under a large rock.  It appears as if many people died in this cave-in, though no blood is visible here.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

West.description: The tunnel continues to the west.

Up.description: A small rock falls from the ceiling and just barely misses your head!

Down.description: It looks like you could move some of the rubble.

extras.text: Large boulders and rocks are scattered about the ground. A big piece of dornick catches your eye.
It looks like a huge slab of rock...you might be able to move it.

rooms.name: A Blood-Covered Shaft
rooms.description: The smell of blood looms in the air.  Debris is scattered about on the floor.  Looking closer at the walls it appears that they appear to be bloodstained as if a gory battle had taken place here.  A few bones remain scattered about the floor.

South.description: The tunnel continues to the south.

West.description: It looks there was a cave-in that way!

extras.text: Some of the bones look to be rather large for a human, and the other bones look to be too small to be human.

rooms.name: Rescue Planning Room
rooms.description: Scattered about the room is some old mining equipment.  In the center of the room is a makeshift table.  On the table are several maps with lines drawn on them.  This room doesn't look like it was part of the original mine, but was added on later.

North.description: You see a rope hanging down.

extras.text: The maps show the site of the cave-in and several proposed rescue tunnels to attempt to find survivors.
This table couldn't have possibly fit through that hole assembled. The table is made out of a few scraps of wood...nothing you'd consider even eating on!

rooms.name: Rescue Up Tunnel
rooms.description: A rope is hanging down through a hole in the ceiling.  The rope feels secure enough to climb up.  The small tunnel continues to the south and east.  Unlike the main tunnels on the upper level, this passageway looks like it was constructed in a hurry, lacking the firmer support structures that make the upper tunnels more secure.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

South.description: The tunnel continues to the south.

Up.description: It looks like you could climb that rope back up.

rooms.name: Rescue Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel looks quickly dug, as if someone or something was in a hurry to create this tunnel.  A few burned out torches are lying against the wall.  The quickly dug tunnel splits off to the north, and also continues east and west. Fallen dirt from the ceiling partially obscures footprints both large and small.

North.description: The rescue tunnel continues to the north.

East.description: The rescue tunnel continues to the east.

West.description: The tunnel continues to the west.

rooms.name: South of the Cave-In
rooms.description: You are standing on the south side of the cave-in.  Large boulders and rocks appear to have prevented any rescue digging to the to the north, though scrapings and scratches in the stone bear testament to some valiant efforts. The small tunnel continues to the east and west.

North.description: A huge boulder blocks the path.

East.description: The rescue tunnel continues to the east.

South.description: The cave-in is the other way! There was no reason to dig in this direction.

West.description: The rescue tunnel continues to the west.

extras.text: Those rocks and boulders are HUGE, no wonder why they were unable to dig around them.

rooms.name: The End of the Rescue Tunnel
rooms.description: The rescue tunnel ends here.  From the looks of it, digging attempts were made to the north and east, but were prevented by large boulders.  The only exit from here is back to the west.  Broken tools lie scattered on the floor, indicating that the efforts at rescue were not stopped lightly; however, they were apparently all futile.

North.description: Look at the size of those boulders!

West.description: The rescue tunnel continues to the west.

extras.text: Those rocks and boulders are HUGE, no wonder why they were unable to dig around them.

rooms.name: West of the Cave-In
rooms.description: You are standing on the west side of the cave-in.  Large boulders and rocks appear to have hampered any rescue attempts to the east.  To the north other obvious rescue attempts were prevented by boulders.  The only exit from here is back to the south.

North.description: A huge boulder and several large rocks block the path.

East.description: Look at the size of those boulders!

South.description: The rescue tunnel continues to the south.

extras.text: Those rocks and boulders are HUGE, no wonder why they were unable to dig around them.

rooms.name: Underneath the Cave-in
rooms.description: Just as you finish safely making the climb down, the slab of rock falls and traps you underneath the cave-in. Rocks surround you in every direction except to the north where you can see a soft glow.

North.description: You see a mine shaft.

East.description: The wall is made up of a huge pile of rocks.

South.description: The wall is made out of pure rock.

West.description: The wall is made out of pure rock.

rooms.name: Engaja's Workshop
rooms.description: Smoke fills your eyes as you enter the room, making it difficult to see. With your eyes watering and stinging you see what appears to be a fire, built inside a makeshift forge.  You also notice a workbench that has various tools lying on top of it.  Squinting you make out a large pile of clear rock lying next to the forge.  The mine shaft is to the north.

North.description: That way leads back to the mine shaft.

rooms.name: The Draining Room
rooms.description: Along the east wall of the room is a pile of minerals pulsating with vibrant colors.  There is another pile of minerals along the west wall but they seem to have been drained of color, for they are crystal clear.  Several empty buckets lie in the center of the room, along with a chair that looks like it's been created from the clear mineral.  Some small puddles of a purplish liquid can been seen here and there.  The mine shaft is to the north.

North.description: That way leads back to the mine shaft.

Down.description: You're standing in a puddle of a purple liquid.

extras.text: It looks purple and smells awful.

rooms.name: Bend in the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: The small torch stuck in the wall of this shaft casts strange, dancing shadows on the black granite walls here.  Veins of mica and other valueless stones can be seen, but all precious minerals seem to have been stripped away. The shaft continues north and east.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Mine Shaft
rooms.description: This shaft looks like it was the main intersection in the original mine. Strong timber holds up the thousands of tons of stone over your head and veins of different minerals can be seen in the walls.  An odd torch in the wall emits a guttering, dim light and something in here smells horrendous.  The intersection leads north, east, south, and west.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: You see the bottom of the cave-in site.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: The Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Black and grey rocks make up the sides of this shaft, though any veins of precious minerals look to be mined out.  Fine dust on the floor shows footprints crossing and recrossing endlessly, some large and some small.  A small torch on the wall barely gives enough light to see by and seems to be providing more smoke than light.  The shaft continues east and west.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: A T-Cross in the Mines
rooms.description: The east-west mine shaft intersects with another shaft heading north here. Muted sounds of metal clinking against rock echo strangely in the intersection, and it is difficult to tell where they are coming from.  The walls look like they have already been mined and are depleted of their mineral content.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Unlike other shafts in this mine, it looks like there is still some activity going on in this section.  Pieces of a weird-looking mineral are embedded in the sides of the shaft, and they catch the light of the small torch on the wall and magnify it, giving the room an odd, purplish light.  The shaft continues north and west.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: They are probably the legendary mineral thawkinixa.
It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: End of the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: The old shaft comes to an abrupt ending here, with much smaller passages leading north and south.  The shorings here are reinforced with metal casings to prevent any collapses, seeming much more secure than other sections of the mines.  A trail of smoke comes from the south.

North.description: There appears to be a room of some sort.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: There appears to be a room of some sort.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Dimly lit by an odd-looking little torch stuck in the wall, the wide mine shaft leads east-west with smaller passageways going off north and south.  The walls seem stripped of their mineral contents.  A small trail of smoke comes from the west, but the air is clear in the other directions.

North.description: There appears to be a room of some sort.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: There appears to be a room of some sort.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Dank and gloomy, this shaft is lit only by a sputtering, strange torch set in the wall.  Gaping holes in the wall make it seem like this section has been stripped of all valuable minerals.  The shaft continues to the south and west. Odd sounds echo from the west.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: The shaft is dimly lit by an odd looking torch stuck in the wall.  From the looks of the sides of the shaft, it has already been mined and is depleted of its mineral.  The timber supports of this section of the mine should probably be replaced soon for safety reasons, as they appear to be decaying.  The shaft continues to the north and south.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Store Room
rooms.description: It seems that you have stumbbled into some sort of old equipment room. Most of the equipment is broken and would be rather useless to a human.  The rest of the unused equipment has rusted from age, and you'd guess that it has been lying around here for at least 100 years.  The only apparent exit is back north.

North.description: There appears to be a door there!

rooms.name: Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Hefty timber supports give this mine shaft a feeling of safety, though the only light available comes from an odd-looking torch set in the wall.  Every now and then you catch a glimpse of a rather odd-looking mineral stuck in the sides of the shaft.  The shaft continues north and south.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Reflecting the light of the small, odd-looking torch set in the wall, the sides of this mine shaft gleam with a strange-looking mineral ore.  It seems much more active in here than in the older sections of the mines.  The shaft bends off to the east and south.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Pieces of a weird, colorful mineral are stuck into the dark rocks of the side of the shaft here, indicating that this section of the mines still has treasure to give.  The only light comes from a small, odd-looking torch stuck in the wall.  The shaft bends off to the north and west.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Engaja's Quarters
rooms.description: The room is chiseled neatly out of stone and seems completly bare except for a small clear rock bed, which lies against the north wall.  From the lack of clutter in this room, you'd guess that the occupant only uses it to get some sleep.  The mine shaft is to the south.

South.description: That way leads back to the mine shaft.

rooms.name: Baldathor's Quarters
rooms.description: The room has various books on fighting techniques piled in one corner, and a large clear rock bed in the other.  Purple stains can be seen all about the room and a small clear rock stool is resting beside the pile of books.  The mine shaft is to the south.

South.description: That way leads back to the mine shaft.

rooms.name: Bend in the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Decaying lumber supports the weight of untold tons of rock over your head. From the looks of the sides of the shaft, this section of the mines has long since been depleted of anything valuable.  An odd torch stuck in the wall barely provides any useful light.  The tunnel continues east and north, with a foul smell coming from the north.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Old Mine Shaft Intersection
rooms.description: Dangerously rotten-looking timbers support this section of the old mines, which is an intersection of a north-south shaft and an east-west shaft.  The walls look depleted of their precious minerals, and the only light comes from a dim, odd-looking torch stuck in the wall.  Noises echo strangely in the intersection, giving little indication of their origin.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: The shaft is dimly lit by an odd looking torch stuck in the wall.  From the looks of the sides of the shaft, it has already been mined and is depleted of its mineral.  The timber supports of this section of the mine are decaying. The shaft continues to the north and west.  There appears to be a door carved in the stone to the south.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

South.description: A home-made combination lock has been set into the wall.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: The lock has three dials. Each dial contains 2 digits. The lock's current setting is 12.11.96. There's a small inscription to the right of the three dials.
Trolls take note: I made this lock easy for you moronic trolls! I gave each of you the numbers, so you don't forget! Type 'open ##.##.##' to open the door. -Baldathor
It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Glimpses of a strange mineral in the walls tantalize your imagination, but it would be very difficult to extract properly without the expertise of the miners trained to work with thawkinixa.  The only light comes from a small torch stuck in the wall.  This shaft continues south and east, with a faint humming sound coming from the east.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Polymorphing Shaft
rooms.description: The walls are pitch black.  The only light to been seen is from the west. To the north a soft humming noise and some faint voices can be heard.  A soft, cool breeze comes from the north as well, making your bones shiver from the unexpected cold.  The mine shaft is back to the west, or you could go north. North does not seem particularly safe.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

rooms.name: End of the Mine Shaft
rooms.description: The shaft is dimly lit by an odd looking torch stuck in the wall.  This appears to be the ending spot of one of the newer mining excursions.  You can see pieces of a weird looking mineral still embedded in the sides of the mine shaft.  The only exit appears to be to the south.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

Up.description: It looks like you could move some boulders aside with some effort.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Troll Bunks
rooms.description: This room smells horrible!  The mine shaft dead-ends here, in a cramped chamber with several long beds of clear rock lining the walls.  Large pieces of mining equipment and garbage is scattered across the floor, much of it looking ike it has not been moved in ages.  The only apparent exit is east.

East.description: You see more troll bunks that way.

rooms.name: Dwarven Bunks
rooms.description: A horrendous odor fills your nose in this room.  Several short, very uncomfortable-looking beds made of clear rock line the walls.  The floor is littered with small pieces of equipment and garbage.  The mine shaft continues south and west.

South.description: That way leads back to the mine shaft.

West.description: You see more troll bunks that way.

rooms.name: End of the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: The timber supports of this section of the mine are decaying, which comes as little surprise since the mine dead-ends here.  Chipped sides of the shaft leave no doubt that the precious thawkinixa is long gone.  The mine shaft continues south.

North.description: Lost in the dust, you barely make out what looks to be a door.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: Dimly lit by a strange, guttering torch set in the wall, this shaft looks like it has been thoroughly deprived of its precious mineral contents. Decaying timber supports suggest that ths section of the mines is quite old. The mine shaft continues east and south.

East.description: The mine shaft continues to the east.

South.description: The mine shaft continues to the south.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Bend in the Old Mine Shaft
rooms.description: This shaft looks like it was mined out some time ago, judging by the deep gouges in the walls.  The only light comes from a dim, odd-looking torch set in the eastern wall.  The air is slightly fresher here than in some other sections of the mine, and you can detect a bit of humidity rather than the dryness present in other sections.  The mine shaft continues north and west.

North.description: The mine shaft continues to the north.

West.description: The mine shaft continues to the west.

extras.text: It looks to be made of thawkinixa, and is secured to the wall.

rooms.name: Cirion's Secret Room
rooms.description: You have found a hidden store room.  The room is filled with several little whittled objects, and a small pile of the many-colored mineral mined here, thawkinixa.  The only obvious exit is back to the south.  There are no visible supports in this room, but it feels safe somehow.

South.description: There appears to be a door.

rooms.name: Cirion's Quarters
rooms.description: The room for the most part is empty, except for a few whittled objects lying here and there and a small clear rock bed against the wall.  The floor is covered with wood shavings.  Though apparently someone's living quarters, it is very clean except for the shavings, which crackle against your feet when you move.  The shaft covered in tree roots lies back east.

East.description: You see some roots sticking through the ceiling of the mine shaft.

rooms.name: The Tree Roots
rooms.description: The roots of some large tree from above ground have found their way here. Obviously the roots prevented any digging to the north, and look to have hampered digging to the east and west.  It looks like several of the roots have been broken or cut off by someone.  The old shaft continues to the south.

East.description: It smells like flowers in that direction.

South.description: That way leads back to the mine shaft.

West.description: There appears to be a room of some sort.

extras.text: The roots look like oak or some other strong wood.  Many of the cuts are healed over, but not all of them.  The roots seem to hungrily caress the water where it pools on the floor, seeking its life-giving nourishment.

rooms.name: The Food Store
rooms.description: You stand in what appears to be the store room.  Shelves made of a clear rock line the walls, and a pile of bones sits in on corner of the room.  The shelves are filled with small jars of water and flowers.  The flowers don't appear to be planted in anything, but they all look fresh.  The shaft covered in tree roots lies back west.

West.description: You see some roots sticking through the ceiling of the mine shaft.

extras.text: A small pile of animal bones lies here, quite brittle to the touch.  Some appear to have teeth marks on them.

rooms.name: The Polymorphing Shaft
rooms.description: Darkness surrounds you!  The shaft starts to spin around in circles, then abruptly stops.  The walls melt and reform.  The exits start dancing around... Up, down, left, right, forwards, backwards...  After a few seconds the craziness comes to an end, and a gentle soft hum fills the room.  There are exits in every direction!

North.description: As you attempt to look north, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

East.description: As you attempt to look east, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

South.description: As you attempt to look south, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

West.description: As you attempt to look west, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Up.description: As you attempt to look up, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Down.description: As you attempt to look down, the exits begin spinning aroung again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

rooms.name: The Polymorphing Shaft
rooms.description: Darkness surrounds you!  The shaft starts to spin around in circles, then abruptly stops.  The walls melt and reform.  The exits start dancing around... Up, down, left, right, forwards, backwards...  After a few seconds the craziness comes to an end, and a gentle soft hum fills the room.  There are exits in every direction!

North.description: As you attempt to look north, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

East.description: As you attempt to look east, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

South.description: As you attempt to look south, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

West.description: As you attempt to look west, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Up.description: As you attempt to look up, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Down.description: As you attempt to look down, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

rooms.name: The Polymorphing Shaft
rooms.description: Darkness surrounds you!  The shaft starts to spin around in circles, then abruptly stops.  The walls melt and reform.  The exits start dancing around... Up, down, left, right, forwards, backwards...  After a few seconds the craziness comes to an end, and a gentle soft hum fills the room.  There are exits in every direction!

North.description: As you attempt to look north, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

East.description: As you attempt to look east, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

South.description: As you attempt to look south, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

West.description: As you attempt to look west, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Up.description: As you attempt to look up, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Down.description: As you attempt to look down, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

rooms.description: Darkness surrounds you!  The shaft starts to spin around in circles, then abruptly stops.  The walls melt and reform.  The exits start dancing around... Up, down, left, right, forwards, backwards...  After a few seconds the craziness comes to an end, and a gentle soft hum fills the room.  There are exits in every direction!

North.description: As you attempt to look north, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

East.description: As you attempt to look east, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

South.description: As you attempt to look south, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

West.description: As you attempt to look west, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Up.description: As you attempt to look up, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Down.description: As you attempt to look down, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

rooms.name: The Polymorphing Shaft
rooms.description: Darkness surrounds you!  The shaft starts to spin around in circles, then abruptly stops.  The walls melt and reform.  The exits start dancing around... Up, down, left, right, forwards, backwards...  After a few seconds the craziness comes to an end, and a gentle soft hum fills the room.  There are exits in every direction!

North.description: As you attempt to look north, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

East.description: As you attempt to look east, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

South.description: As you attempt to look south, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

West.description: As you attempt to look west, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Up.description: As you attempt to look up, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Down.description: As you attempt to look down, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

rooms.name: The Polymorphing Shaft
rooms.description: Darkness surrounds you!  The shaft starts to spin around in circles, then abruptly stops.  The walls melt and reform.  The exits start dancing around... Up, down, left, right, forwards, backwards...  After a few seconds the craziness comes to an end, and a gentle soft hum fills the room.  There are exits in every direction!

North.description: As you attempt to look north, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

East.description: As you attempt to look east, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

South.description: As you attempt to look south, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

West.description: As you attempt to look west, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Up.description: As you attempt to look up, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

Down.description: As you attempt to look down, the exits begin spinning around again! You have no idea which direction you're facing anymore!

rooms.name: Mesmeriz's Throne
rooms.description: As you gather your senses from being spun around so many times you realize that you're standing in Mesmeriz's Throne room.  Huge piles of thawkinixa are everywhere.  An entire throne carved out of the weird mineral stands in front of you.  Should you wish to leave the site of such treasure, there appears to be a small exit to the north.

North.description: It's too dark to tell.

rooms.name: The Pit
rooms.description: You are in a pitch black pit.  A squeaking sound, as of rats or mice scurrying about, can be heard.  However, no small creatures appear that could be making these sounds.  A faint breeze comes from the south, indicating there may be an exit in that direction.

South.description: It's too dark to tell.

rooms.name: Secret Down Tunnel
rooms.description: You have found a small dug out crawlway that leads down.  It looks like you might be able to squeeze down through it, though it would be a tight fit.  Odd sounds come from below, hinting at inhabitants, but the tunnel's construction seems different from the rest of the mine.  The main mines are west and the secret tunnel continues down.

West.description: A large pile of rocks looks moveable.

Down.description: It looks like you can fit through the crawlway.

rooms.name: Secret Up Tunnel
rooms.description: Here is a small dug out crawlway leading up.  It looks like it would be barely wide enough to squeeze through.  The tunnel leading west is wide and shored up with wide beams of oak.  Though it has a different feel than the main mines, these tunnels were obviously professionally made rather than hastily tunneled.  North is the same sort of wide passageway, but there are many flashing lights coming from that direction.

North.description: A bright light blinds you momentarily.

West.description: There looks to be a room of some sort.

Up.description: It looks like you can fit through the crawlway.

rooms.name: The Conjuring Circle
rooms.description: This room is filled with many different colors of flashing lights.  On the floor is a circle drawn in red sand and, inside it, many arcane symbols surrounding a smaller circle of black sand.  Disturbing the circle is probably a bad idea, judging by the crispy blackened bones at its edge.  The only apparent exit is to the south.

South.description: There's a tunnel to the south.

rooms.name: Mesmeriz's Quarters
rooms.description: You stand in what appears to be almost some sort of lab.  Flasks and vials line the shelves made out of a clear rock, and books cover most of the floor. There's a small clear rock bed against one of the walls.  There appears to be some kind of portal south, and the tunnel continues back east.

East.description: There's a tunnel to the east.

South.description: There appears to be some sort of portal.

rooms.name: Mesmeriz's Secret Treasure Room
rooms.description: A breathtaking sight of treasure awaits your eyes in this chamber.  Rather than a part of the mines, the edges of the floor simply stop at a grey edge. Perhaps this room was created by magic for the sorcer's own personal use - immense piles of silver, gold, and an ore that pulses with bright colors line the chamber but resist efforts to be picked up.  A swirling portal leads north, the only exit from the chamber.

North.description: There appears to be some sort of portal.

rooms.name: A Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  Travel is possible in all directions, with east leading back to the Black Woods and the dense forest continuing to the north, south, and west.

North.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

East.description: The woods continue.

South.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

West.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: A Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  Thick brambles prevent movement in every direction except south.

South.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: A Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about.  A small creek burbles somewhere, hidden by the thick growth.  You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  Thick brambles prevent travel in all directions except east.

East.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: A Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  Passage is possible north and south.

North.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

South.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: A Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  Passage is possible north and west, though the brambles are too thick to pass in the other directions.

North.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

West.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: A Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  It is possible to proceed east and west.

East.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: The Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  The deep brush is passable east and west.

West.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: The Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  North and south the rambles are too thick to pass, but it should be possible to continue east and west.

East.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

West.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

rooms.name: The Dense Forest
rooms.description: The density of the foilage greatly inhibits your ability to move about. You are standing in thigh high brush, and numerous huge trees are standing over your shoulder watching your every move.  The strong smell of resin and leaves fills the dark, shadowy air.  To the west there looks to be some sort of a clearing.  You could also push your way back east.

East.description: It looks like you might be able to squeeze your way through there.

West.description: It looks like there is a clearing of some sort.

rooms.name: An Island on Black Lake
rooms.description: The dark waters of Black Lake surround this tiny island on all sides. Farther to the west rise the towering black peaks of a mountain range, which break a bit to the north before curving around to run east-west instead of north-south.  Through the break is visible the jagged, smoking shape of the ruined, once-proud city of Templace, but it does not look possible to enter it from here.  South past a brief channel of black water is the shore and the dense Black Woods, and farther to the east, which seems like the only direction with water deep enough to run a canoe through, is the well-travelled Nikozian Trail.  On the ground of the island is a giant boulder that seems quite immobile with a strange scent coming from it.

East.description: Black Lake lies to the east.

Down.description: Down lies a huge boulder of rough granite, black and pink and filled with shiny mica and opaque white quartz inclusions as well as an oddly colored mineral, barely visible beneath the lichens of all colors: black, grey, green, and even orange.  Even an ogre could not move this boulder.

extras.text: Down lies a huge boulder of rough granite, black and pink and filled with shiny mica and opaque white quartz inclusions as well as an oddly colored mineral, barely visible beneath the lichens of all colors: black, grey, green, and even orange.  Even an ogre could not move this boulder.
